edu.ohiou.labimp.basis
Class GUIApplet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      edu.ohiou.labimp.basis.GUIApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Viewable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Draw2DApplet
public class GUIApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements Viewable

This class is able to show any Viewable object as standalone or within browser It can be invkoed as stand alone, without target, or with target. It is also invoked when any viewabble object need to disply itself.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getParameter

public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String defaultValue)
Method returns th evalue for applet parameter, implemented after JBuilder code for JApplet extension that returns paramter in both browser and stand-alone modes

Parameters:
name - name of parameter returned
defaultValue - default value, if parameter can not be found
Returns:
the value of requested parameter, or defautl value if not found
